vikram.connect.com.connect

Class DownloadAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<DownloadAdapter.NewViewHolder>
      • vikram.connect.com.connect.DownloadAdapter

  • public class DownloadAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<DownloadAdapter.NewViewHolder>
    Class is the custom adapter for RecyclerView present on the download modules screen Will inflate CardViews inside recycler view to match passed in data CardView design is specified in old_cv.xml

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DownloadAdapter.NewViewHolder
      Internal static class which inflates the CardView specific to this recycler view finds elements and inflates them when passed in input.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DownloadAdapter(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> myDataset, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity act)
      Constructor which grabs data to be used by this adapter to inflate CardViews

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getItemCount() 
      void onBindViewHolder(DownloadAdapter.NewViewHolder nvh, int i)
      Configures parameters inside the CardView to take in values The values are assigned to various elements in CardView creating the UI we see Listeners are assigned to buttons in the CardView and their actions specified
      DownloadAdapter.NewViewHolder onCreateViewHolder(ViewGroup viewGroup, int i)
      Finds and inflates the relevant CardView for this RecyclerView
